metadata.dc:author: Pérez, Amador Schüller
metadata.dc:description: The obesity is the metabolic most frequent illness; it affects at least to the population's of adults 12% and it produces increase of the morbimortality. We analyze their diverse mechanism: endogenous, constitutional, hyperbulimic, for sedentary, family or hereditary, senile, hypothalamic, neuro-psychic, endocrine-metabolic, characteristic of certain races or ethnos, for alterations of the trofic appetite center, syndrome of Morgagni-Stewart-Morel, tumors of the islets of Langerhans, etc. Also, we index therapeutic rules.
metadata.dc:title: Patocronia y pronóstico de la obesidad.
[Pathochrony and presage of obesity].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina
